_header: Here endeth as ye may see
_description: A colophon ascribing The Pricke of Conscience to ‘Richard þe holy ermyte’ — two couplets

BLEge3245.Transcription: Here endiþ as ȝe may seeStimulus consciencieAftir Richard Ve Holy ermytethat soþly þus gan þis book endyte
BLEge3245.Note: Written all in rubric by the scribe of the Pricke of Conscience (5398); author Hampool written by same hand in rubric below (f. 156).
BLEge3245.Editions:
Allen,  Hope Emily. 
             Writings Attributed to Richard Rolle.
         New York: Modern Language Association of America, 1927: 375.
